data.trans_hint: Sư tử là một trong những động vật ăn thịt đáng sợ nhất.
data.en_hint: Lions are one of the scariest predators of all time.
data.content_game_1: Lions are one of the scariest predators of all time.
data.answer_en_hint: Lions are one of the scariest predators of all time.

data.trans_hint: Nhiều loài chim nhỏ và động vật gặm nhấm trở thành con mồi cho mèo nhà.
data.en_hint: Many small birds and rodents fall prey to the domestic cat.
data.content_game_1: Many small birds and rodents fall prey to the domestic cat.
data.answer_en_hint: Many small birds and rodents fall prey to the domestic cat.

data.trans_hint: Họ chưa từng nghĩ về hậu quả về sau của nước đi đó.
data.en_hint: They have never thought of the repercussions of the move.
data.content_game_1: They have never thought of the repercussions of the move.
data.answer_en_hint: They have never thought of the repercussions of the move.

data.trans_hint: Thú ăn thịt cực kì nhạy cảm với mùi hương.
data.en_hint: Predators are extremely sensitive to scents.
data.content_game_1: Predators are extremely sensitive to scents.
data.answer_en_hint: Predators are extremely sensitive to scents.

data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều loài vật đang trên bờ vực tuyệt chủng.
data.en_hint: Many species are on the verge of extinction.
data.content_game_1: Many species are on the verge of extinction.
data.answer_en_hint: Many species are on the verge of extinction.

data.trans_hint: Đất bị xói mòn bởi cơn lũ.
data.en_hint: The soil has been eroded by the flood.
data.content_game_1: The soil has been eroded by the flood.
data.answer_en_hint: The soil has been eroded by the flood.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi chưa thấy bất kì dấu hiệu nào của thực vật ở đây.
data.en_hint: We haven't seen any signs of vegetation here.
data.content_game_1: We haven't seen any signs of vegetation here.
data.answer_en_hint: We haven't seen any signs of vegetation here.

data.trans_hint: Vụ mùa ngô đã thất bại bởi vì sâu bệnh.
data.en_hint: The corn crops have failed because of vermin.
data.content_game_1: The corn crops have failed because of vermin.
data.answer_en_hint: The corn crops have failed because of vermin.

data.trans_hint: Việc nhổ cỏ dại tốn của tôi cả buổi sáng.
data.en_hint: It took me the whole morning to remove the weed in my garden.
data.content_game_1: It took me the whole morning to remove the weed in my garden.
data.answer_en_hint: It took me the whole morning to remove the weed in my garden.

data.trans_hint: Mảnh đất này quá khô cằn để có thể trồng bất cứ loại cây trồng nào.
data.en_hint: The land is too arid to grow any crops.
data.content_game_1: The land is too arid to grow any crops.
data.answer_en_hint: The land is too arid to grow any crops.
